description: Tucked away in an unexpected location in a residential district, this restaurant is nonetheless popular with its loyal and regular clientele. And the reason is obvious – the high quality of the cuisine served here. Bologna’s traditional specialities and other Italian dishes are joined on the menu by a few fish options on Thursdays and Fridays.
